original_title: Frank Zappa: Pioneer Of Future Music
overview: Frank Zappa: Pioneer Of Future Music, parts 1 & 2 is a 2007 documentary about Frank Zappa. Some footage is similar to the previous two Zappa documentaries from Scheffer, but also adds a lot of new material, including the Teheran Symphony Orchestra in Iran performing Zappa's music.
title: Frank Zappa: Pioneer Of Future Music
